___name.description: The name of action rule that needs to be created/updated

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Action rule properties defining scope, conditions, suppression logic for action rule

___status.description: Indicates if the given action rule is enabled or disabled.

___conditions.description: Conditions in alert instance to be matched for a given action rule. Default value is all. Multiple values could be provided with comma separation.

___scope.description: Target scope for a given action rule. By default scope will be the subscription. User can also provide list of resource groups or list of resources from the scope subscription as well.
